name: The European network for community-led initiatives on climate change and sustainability
goal: ECOLISE is a coalition of organisations engaged in promoting and supporting local communities across Europe in their efforts to build pathways to a sustainable future. The members of ECOLISE include international, national and sometimes regional networks of community-based initiatives, as well as other bodies engaged in European-level research, training, communications or other activities to support community-based action on climate change and sustainability. By bringing these organisations together, ECOLISE seeks to establish a common Europe-wide agenda and a platform for collective action.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Consultations on the multi-annual financial framework, cohesion policy and rural development, and also ongoing
policy initiatives linked to climate action and sustainability.
